headline: CarMax (KMX): Revisiting Valuation After a Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: CarMax (KMX) shares have quietly climbed about 17% over the past month even as the stock is still down roughly 55% over the past year, setting up an interesting reset in expectations. See our latest analysis for CarMax. That sharp 30 day share price return of about 17% looks more like a bounce than a full trend change, given the roughly 52% year to date share price decline and even steeper one year total shareholder return loss. If this rebound has you rethinking where the better...
